text: I'm using the Vue boilerplate and am running into an issue with feeding `{{module|tojson}}` to my app when a user embeds a CTA using a richtext field. I've tried escaping `{{module}}` (both before and after the `|tojson` filter) and replacing double quotes with `\"` but no dice. Do I need to loop through every module field and update the value of richtext fields to an escaped version? Should I be using ``backticks`` somehow?
